relevant_findings.neck: Supple with no thyromegaly or lymphadenopathy.
relevant_findings.chest: Normal respirations and breathing comfortably on room air. Lungs with rales at bases bilaterally that improve with deep inspiration.
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: PMI normal size and not displaced. Regular rhythm. Normal S1, S2. III/VI HSM best heard at RUSB but heard throughout precordium. No diastolic murmur. JVP 6 cm. 2+ carotids.
relevant_findings.abdomen: Normal bowel sounds. Moderate tenderness in epigastric region. Tenderness on deep palpation of RUQ. Positive Murphy's sign.
relevant_findings.skin: Icteric. Fine erythematous rash on trunk and neck.
relevant_findings.neurological: Alert, oriented x1. Calmed and pleasant, attempts to answer questions but knows little history. CN II-XI intact.
